name: another awesome straw cheesecake
description:
How to turn your strawberry milk into a strawberry cheesecake you ask?
Easy as pie...
I just took away 1% of Vanilla Swirl and instead i used 1% of TPA Cheesecake Graham Crust. (Btw i can't stand CAP Nyc Cheesecake.It gives me a rancid disgusting aftertaste at the end of of the exhale)
Anyways,with this small alteration you get just enough crust and the creamy cheesy properties of a cheesecake.You could probably bump it up to 2% if you like even more crust and "cheese",but that might throw the balance off a bit.
For me 1% is just enough to get where i want it. 
All the other flavor notes you can find at my original recipe
 https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/33148#another_awesome_straw_milk_by_demonic_mixer

Enjoy and let me know what you think!
author: Demonic_Mixer
